definition: to have no contact with/to be cut off from/(electricity) to insulate
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The rotating slip ring is insulated from the shaft by a laminated plastic bushing .
sentences.chinese: 旋转滑环是用片状塑料衬套与轴绝缘的。

sentences.english: Modern exterior doors often fit and insulate better than old ones.
sentences.chinese: 现代健美的外门往往比旧的绝缘。

sentences.english: Conductor screen is formed by extruded semi-conducting layer or wrapped with semi-conducting tapes and semi-conducting layer.
sentences.chinese: 绝缘采用超净交联聚乙烯绝缘料挤包在导体屏蔽上。

sentences.english: Conductor screen is formed by extruded semi-conducting layer or wrapped with semi-conducting tapes and semi-conducting layer.
sentences.chinese: 绝缘采用超净交联聚乙烯绝缘料挤包在导体屏蔽上。

sentences.english: Each test site can be thought of as an isolated resistor.
sentences.chinese: 可以认为每个测试点都是一个绝缘的电阻器。

sentences.english: A window frame made of insulating materials according to the principle of an electric fly-flap.
sentences.chinese: 根据电蚊蝇拍的原理，用绝缘材料做窗框。

sentences.english: These layers are traditionally prepared using catalysts that contain metal.
sentences.chinese: 这些绝缘层传统上的催化剂包含金属。

sentences.english: In damp working places, the ground should be covered by rubber sheets or other insulating materials.
sentences.chinese: 工作地点潮湿时，地面应铺有橡胶板或其他绝缘材料。

sentences.english: The tapered coaxial slow-wave-structure is the most important part of a MILO.
sentences.chinese: 渐变型同轴慢波结构是磁绝缘线振荡器的核心部分。

sentences.english: The research results are of value for diagnoses of thermal failure of the cable terminal.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果对电缆端热击穿的绝缘诊断是有价值的。

sentences.english: These electrons will not pass into the phototube because of the insulation on the metal plate.
sentences.chinese: 由于金属板上有绝缘层，这些电子不能进入光电管。

sentences.english: With sulfur hexafluoride gas to double as insulation interrupter and circuit breaker.
sentences.chinese: 以六氟化硫气体进行灭弧并兼作绝缘用的断路器。

sentences.english: For instance, rubber was used to insulate electrical wires.
sentences.chinese: 举例说，橡胶用来使电线绝缘。

sentences.english: If you're dead at this point, you didn't use an insulated screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在这个环节挂了，说明你的起子不绝缘。

sentences.english: Insulated joints if required shall be installed just before final leveling and lining of the track.
sentences.chinese: 需要时，绝缘接头应在轨道最终衬砌和整平前安装。

sentences.english: Copper conductor XLPE insulated low-smoke and non-halo sheathed Flame-retardant power cable.
sentences.chinese: 铜芯交联聚乙烯绝缘低烟无卤护套阻燃电力电缆。

definition: to break/to sever/to turn off (electric switch)
